content: the crocheting guidance available as following https //youtu be/lbm6wh-i5ly the **yarn kit** link coming soon please stay tuned for updates adjust the finished size by **changing the crochet hook size** making it suitable for a wider range of people you can choose to crochet a **longer or shorter version** according to personal preference the cardigan s floral section features the popular daisy pattern of the moment which is quick and easy to crochet in terms of color scheme two different options have been chosen the milky rainbow daisy style are crocheted with colored yarn for the flower parts to contrast with the solid color at the edges creating a polka dot effect in various colors for the other two daisy styles the flower sections are crocheted with solid-colored yarn while the edges are done with colored yarn making the overall design more breathable the random color combinations on the colored parts highlight the diverse color changes even more **material** needle zipper **yarn amount** blue ashes daisy style 19# - 6 44# - 3 01# - 1 17# - 1 29# - 1 33# - 1 40# - 1 42# - 1 45# - 1 milky daisy style 06# - 8 13# - 1 30# - 1 31# - 1 38# - 1 42# - 1 47# - 1 56# - 1 59# - 1 milky rainbow daisy style 06# - 10 09# - 1 30# - 1 42# - 1 45# - 1 47# - 1 59# - 1 the crocheting guidance will guide you step by step through completing this project and we hope that during the process you discover even more joy in the colors and stitching techniques used please visit our youtube channel - susan s family to view them you can also find us at https //www instagram com/susansfamily2013/ more product can be found in this account please remember to subscribe & turn on notifications if you d like to know immediately when there s anew video up
